Event

public Event(Level parent,
             EventMDO mdo,
             int x,
             int y)
Creates a new event with the specified data at the specified coords.

Parameters:
parent - The parent level of the event
mdo - The data to create the event with
x - The x-coord of the event (in pixels)
y - The y-coord of the event (in pixels)
Method Detail

render

public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
Description copied from interface: Renderable
Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL. Nothing needs to be passed here because OpenGL is one giant statemachine clusterfuck.

Parameters:
camera - The camera to render with, may or may not be used
